name: Familial Hypercholesterolemia
chief_complaint: I have yellowish bumps on my skin and my doctor said my cholesterol is very high
prognosis: Good with early treatment, but increased risk of cardiovascular disease if untreated
description: An autosomal dominant genetic disorder characterized by extremely high LDL cholesterol levels from birth, leading to premature cardiovascular disease if untreated. Caused by mutations in LDLR, APOB, or PCSK9 genes.
risk_factors: family history of early heart disease
